data.title: The Towering Inferno - Full Cast & Crew
data.meta_description: Learn more about the full cast of The Towering Inferno with news, photos, videos and more at TV Guide
data.text:
69 Metascore

1974

2 hr 45 mins

Drama, Suspense, Action & Adventure

PG

Watchlist

Where to Watch

During the opening party of a brand new skyscraper, a colossal, raging fire breaks out, threatening the lives of those inside. Firefighters risk their lives to combat the blaze and save as many people as they can.
